rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall aligning with Vastu principles for positivity and auspicious energy. Spacious area to welcome guests.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living space designed to accommodate family gatherings and open interaction, ensuring abundant natural light from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with robust materials reflecting the Brutalist aesthetic. Incorporates local building norms and efficient workflow design, with a designated area for dining.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom located in the north-east quadrant to balance privacy and positive energy. Features ample natural light and a private balcony facing North.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with natural ventilation and soundproofing measures, adhering to both aesthetic and functional standards.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed for productivity with quiet ambiance. Incorporates large north-facing windows ensuring ample daylight while preserving privacy.

openings.description: A robust entrance designed for easy access and security, aligned with the North-facing design principle.
Large north-facing windows in key rooms to optimize natural light and adhere to Vastu recommendations for prosperity.
Doors connecting different rooms, designed in a Brutalist style with functional simplicity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Enhanced master suite with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet, designed to maximize privacy and relaxation. North-facing window ensures continued adherence to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A well-appointed suite for guests with integrated storage and a small ensuite, maintaining consistency in design language and functional efficiency.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: Additional study area complementing the home office below. Focused on calm and concentration, with natural light from north-facing windows as per Vastu.

openings.description: A sturdy staircase connecting ground floor to the first floor, following Brutalist style with functional design.
A small balcony providing private outdoor space and natural light for the master suite, aligned with North-facing guidelines.

vastu_details.energy_flow: The design prioritizes a north-oriented energy flow to enhance positivity, ensuring that vital spaces like the entrance and main living areas benefit from natural light and calm ambience.
